channel.title: Real-Scape [1st Release]
channel.description:
[CENTER]Hello & Welcome to Kamran's coding log. Here I will be showing you what I code in each version. [COLOR="green"]Green = Finished.[/COLOR] [COLOR="orange"]Orange = Under Process.[/COLOR] [COLOR="red"]Red = Not Started[/COLOR][/CENTER] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]V1.2[/b] [COLOR="green"]*Working Cusom Item Intergers. *Harder Bandos God. [Lowered Drop Rate/Increased HP] *Some Custom Item Bonuses. [Whips, etc] *Sedridor, Rune Essence Mine. *Auto-Restarter. *Working Pin System![/COLOR] [COLOR="green"]*In-Game Highscores! *Money More Valuable! *Changed Drop Rates. *Added Gloves To Shops. *Token Exhanging. *New Commands. *New Loading Up Screen. *New Loading Up Message For Each Position (Moderator, Donator, Administrator, Owner Etc).[/COLOR]
[b]Pictures Of V1.2;[/b] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/25qx8wk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2wojbif.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/6td05f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2qiss1z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/mvj0ns.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2zr0vhs.png[/img]
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]V1.3[/b] [COLOR="green"]*Grand Exchange [MINI VERSION FOR NOW] *Some Customs [Spirit Shields Etc] *Working IPBan, IpMute, UnIpMute. *Working Dragon Mace Inventory Look. [BEFORE DRAGON HEAD/NOW PROPER DRAGON MACE LOOK] *More Customs. *Fixed Bronze Phat Glitch. *Fixed the Fences (They Used To Be Helmets Floating)[/COLOR] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [b]V1.4[/b] [COLOR="green"]*New Custom Login Interface. *New Kalphite Queen Interface. *New Customs. *Fixed Ints. *Pking Store. *Fixed Skillcape Freeze. *Donators Can't Trade. [INCLUDING STAFF IF THEY ARE DONATOR][/COLOR]
[b]Pictures:[/b] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/lgu4l.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/33d84ky.png[/img]
[b]V1.5[/b] [COLOR="green"]*Fixed Glitch. *NEW STAFF LIST!!! *Drop a Cat or Use a whistle and you'll be able to summon a cat. *OTHER STUFF THAT I CBA TO WRITE. JUST LOOK AND YOU'LL SEE. *[/COLOR]
Credits; -Delta 35% -Me 55% -Tutorials 6% -Jay & Guy 4% [Some Guys That Gave Me The Source To Code For Them -.-]
Since I'm Quitting RSPS's Soon, I thought why not release my work.
Hope you enjoy Real-Scape.
~Kamran.
LINK:
MUST USE CLIENT WITH SOURCE OTHERWISE IT WOULDN'T WORK!
http://www.mediafire.com/?axd27fdno2x39rq

item.title: Real-Scape [1st Release]
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

[quote=“Kamran1, post:15, topic:400817”][quote author=OmgItsShane link=topic=497873.msg3641215#msg3641215 date=1309025195]

Mike, I do believe you are one of the people who downloaded this.

So before calling me a douche, think who made this server.

Even Jay said I could release the server it was my work anyway.

Lol “my work” L0l You did a couple tuts which doesn’t count as ‘your work’ and Pk-Planet isn’t your work.

*NEW STAFF LIST!!!

OMFG THESE TAKE LIKE HOURS TO MAKE
[/quote]

Idiot, Its an interface.

L2Read - Tutorials 6%.

You honestly know nothing about this server so don’t bullsh*t about it.

@Blxze&Crisis - Thanks.

@Fridder - I guarentee there is no virus in this but if you think otherwise don’t download it.[/quote]
Most of those interfaces are built in to Delta’s which requires no skill to make one.

Read full topic

item.title: Real-Scape [1st Release]
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

[CENTER]Hello & Welcome to Kamran’s coding log.
Here I will be showing you what I code in each version.
[COLOR=“green”]Green = Finished.[/COLOR] [COLOR=“orange”]Orange = Under Process.[/COLOR] [COLOR=“red”]Red = Not Started[/COLOR][/CENTER]

V1.2
[COLOR=“green”]*Working Cusom Item Intergers.
*Harder Bandos God. [Lowered Drop Rate/Increased HP]
*Some Custom Item Bonuses. [Whips, etc]
*Sedridor, Rune Essence Mine.
*Auto-Restarter.
*Working Pin System![/COLOR]
[COLOR=“green”]*In-Game Highscores!
*Money More Valuable!
*Changed Drop Rates.
*Added Gloves To Shops.
*Token Exhanging.
*New Commands.
*New Loading Up Screen.
*New Loading Up Message For Each Position (Moderator, Donator, Administrator, Owner Etc).[/COLOR]

Pictures Of V1.2;

2wojbif.png297×1597

6td05f.png760×465



V1.3
[COLOR=“green”]*Grand Exchange [MINI VERSION FOR NOW]
*Some Customs [Spirit Shields Etc]
*Working IPBan, IpMute, UnIpMute.
*Working Dragon Mace Inventory Look. [BEFORE DRAGON HEAD/NOW PROPER DRAGON MACE LOOK]
*More Customs.
*Fixed Bronze Phat Glitch.
*Fixed the Fences (They Used To Be Helmets Floating)[/COLOR]

V1.4
[COLOR=“green”]*New Custom Login Interface.
*New Kalphite Queen Interface.
*New Customs.
*Fixed Ints.
*Pking Store.
*Fixed Skillcape Freeze.
*Donators Can’t Trade. [INCLUDING STAFF IF THEY ARE DONATOR][/COLOR]

Pictures:

lgu4l.png765×501

33d84ky.png763×501

V1.5
[COLOR=“green”]*Fixed Glitch.
*NEW STAFF LIST!!!
*Drop a Cat or Use a whistle and you’ll be able to summon a cat.
*OTHER STUFF THAT I CBA TO WRITE. JUST LOOK AND YOU’LL SEE.
*[/COLOR]

Credits;
-Delta 35%
-Me 55%
-Tutorials 6%
-Jay & Guy 4% [Some Guys That Gave Me The Source To Code For Them -.-]

Since I’m Quitting RSPS’s Soon, I thought why not release my work.

Hope you enjoy Real-Scape.

~Kamran.
